title: Pes bus
content: Can someone give more info about the free PES  bus system from Mysore Road metro station to  college

comments.body: Whenever they feel like they send buses it depends on their mood. Somedays 4 buses come somedays only 1. Usually the last bus leaves from mysore road metro at 7: 40 very rarely  bus came at 7:45.
Oh ok …so is it fine to rely on them ?
If you reach mysore road before 7 40 then yes.
